author: dlr
msg: Try to avoid confusion between list items in a tuple, the tuple
itself, and sub-tuples within a tuple.
(vparse_tuple): Rename the "list" argument to "items" to better
reflect that it is a list of svn_ra_svn_item_t *'s, and
differentiate it from list items within itself (e.g. items with
format specifier 'l').  Rename local variable "list_level" to
